org.jppf.client.event

Class JobEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.jppf.client.event.JobEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class JobEvent
extends EventObject
    Event emitted by a job when its execution starts or completes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getJob

        public JPPFJob getJob()
        Get the source of this event.
        Returns:
        the source as a JPPFJob object.

      • getTasks

        @Deprecated
public List<JPPFTask> getTasks()
        Deprecated. use JobEvent.getJobTasks() instead.
        Get the tasks that were dispatched or returned.

        This method returns a non null value only for jobDispatched() and jobReturned() events.

        Returns:
        a list of JPPFTask instances.

      • getJobTasks

        public List<Task<?>> getJobTasks()
        Get the tasks that were dispatched or returned.

        This method returns a non null value only for jobDispatched() and jobReturned() events.

        Returns:
        a list of JPPFTask instances.
        Since:
        4.0
